channel.title: Experiences on Heeseok
channel.description: Recent content in Experiences on Heeseok

item.title: AI Visualization with CT
item.description: Given a CSV file containing category names, (x, y) coordinates, and density values, generate a heatmap-based DICOM Image and DICOM Segmentation files for visualization in VolView. Steps: Data Normalization: Normalize x, y coordinates to the range [0,1]. Normalize density values using the formula: df[“z”] = np.log1p(df[“z”] - zmin) / np.log1p(zmax - zmin) Category-wise Density Accumulation: Generate heatmaps for each category by applying Gaussian smoothing with sigma = 0.

item.title: Old
item.description: Experience Develop PRM (Product Roadmap) and TRM (Technology Roadmap) Customize Agile-Based Software Development Processes Create and maintain project documentation Build and manage software product quality checklists Analyze and evaluate software development team members' competencies Set up PACS (Picture Archiving and Communication System) server/client development environments using DCMTK Design directory and file structures for storing DICOM (Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine) and related files
